column1: Thủ Dầu Một (listen) is the capital city of Bình Dương Province
column3: located at around 10°58′0″N 106°39′0″E. The city has an area of 118.66 km²
column6: and is located 20 km north of downtown Hồ Chí Minh City
column7: on the left bank of the Saigon River
column8: upstream from the city. Although this is an administratively separate city
column9: it is considered as a satellite city of the Hồ Chí Minh City Metropolitan Area.

column1: Thu Dau Mot lies to the south of Bình Dương Province and is contiguous with Saigon River:
To the east is Tân Uyên
To the west is Ho Chi Minh City
To the south is Thuận An
To the north is Bến Cát

column2: some researchers stated that the name "Thu Dau Mot" had originated from Cambodian language
column3: but most of people claimed that the name "Thu Dau Mot" was a Vietnamese phrase
column4: which combines two phrases that are Thu (means keep) and Dau Mot
column5: whose the first word is a tree called dipterocarpaceae and the second one is a number. According to rumors
column6: in a defense base (literally means "Thu") in Bình An
column7: there was a tree on the hill (tree here is a kind of species in dipterocarpaceae
column8: and it is called "Dau" in Vietnamese language)
column9: "Mot" is number one in Vietnamese language
column10: so the name "Thu Dau Mot" was born

column1: Thủ Dầu Một has seen a rapid expansion and economic development since 1997
column2: as the province has become an important industrial hub of the region. In January 2007
column3: the city was officially recognized as a third-class town. It became a city in July 2012. There is a 4
column4: 200-ha urban-tech park under development. Thủ Dầu Một will be a modern city within the Hồ Chí Minh City Metropolitan Area (including Thủ Dầu Một
column7: Biên Hòa and parts of Đồng Nai and Bình Dương provinces).

column1: It became a first-class city on 6 December 2017.
